text: Mago knazupa Jisasima rempima hu'nezamige'za anampina Farisi vaheki, kasegerema ugagote'naza vahe'enena tavaoma'are mani'naze. (Zamagara mago mago ana kumatamina Galilitima, Judiati'ma, Jerusaletima hu'za Agrane emani'naze.) Higeno Ra Anumzamofo vahe'ma zamazeri knamare hanavea, Agripi me'negeno zamazeri so'e hu'ne.
